name: LSAcceptanceFlags
desc: The specification that determines whether an app can accept (open) an item.

items.name: init(rawValue: OptionBits)
items.desc: Creates a new acceptance flag from the given raw value.

items.name: static var acceptDefault: LSAcceptanceFlags
items.desc: Requests the default behavior that does not require the user interface to log in be presented.

items.name: static var acceptAllowLoginUI: LSAcceptanceFlags
items.desc: Requests that the user interface to log in be presented.
